Translations.Text: Is
S Leqwoan uuwib
Kecc, d uuee, ar seg imazanen
ef ubrid uwqim
Tarusi n Uzmir Ipeunun
iwakken a pnedoev agdud; ur pwanedoen imezwura nnsen, d$a stehzan
Ni$ iuao wawal, $ef tegwti degsen, d$a ur uminen
Ih, Nurez iten si tmegoav ar tmira, d$a ndellen, ur iiinizen
Nerra aedid zdat sen, aedid deffir sen. Nesbur asen, ihi ur pwalin
Iauva fellasen: ama tnubav ten, ne$ ur ten tnubav; ur ppamnen
Nabi kan wid iiiafaoen asmekti, ippagwaden Aenin, di tbavnit. Ihi, becceo it s ssmae, akked warraz ukyis
Ih, Nekwni Nessidir lmeggtin. Nepparu ayen xeddmen akked lateo nnsen. Neeseb yal cci di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Awi asen d amedya: at temdint, mi ten id usan imazanen
Mi sen Nuzen sin, nekoen ten. Null s wis krav. Nnan: "nekwni d imazanen $uowen
Nnan: "kunwi d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Aenin ur d Issers acemma. Kunwi, teskiddibem kan
Nnan: "Mass nne$ Ieoa, s tidep, ar $uowen id neppuceggaa
Ay fella$ kan d timenna ipbegginen
Nnan: "war ccekk, tesskeesem a$. Ma ur teebisem ara, a kwen neooem, u a nessuk fellawen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Nnan: "lkees nnwen yidwen. Day imi i kwen smektin? Maca, kunwi d agdud amaafun
Iusa d si ieof ibaaden n temdint, urgaz s tazzla. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ddut d imazanen
Ddut d wid ur awen d nessuter taqviat, nitni pwanhan
Amek ur aabde$ ara Win iyi d Ixelqen, u $uoeS tu$alin nnwen
Day ad sau$, war Neppa, ioebbiten? Ur iyi d teppawi acemma cafuaa nnsen, ma Irad iyi Uenin ccqa; ur iyi pselliken
Yili nek, war ccekk, di ttelfan n uuee
Nek, umne$ s Mass nnwen. Ihi selt iyi d
Nnan as: "ekcem ar Loennet"! Inna: "anna$, a lemmer ad ieeo ugdud iw
amek iyi Isemmee Mass iw, u Irra yi seg imaazuzen
Ur d Nuzen ara, i ugdud is, deffir es, aasekoiw, seg igenni. Ur d Neppazen
Siwa yiwet n ti$oi kan, d$a nitni negren
A tawa$it n imdanen! Ur ten id ippas umazan, mebla ma ttahan fellas
Day ur eoin ara aceal isuta i Nen$a, uqbel nnsen? Nitni, s tidep, ur d ppu$alen $uosen
U, akken ma llan akw, a d rsen, zdat nne£
Assekni i nitni, d akal immuten. Nessider t id, Nessuffe$ ed segs, iaaqqayen, teppen segsen
Nerra degs tibeirin n tezdayin akked tfeooant. Nessenfeg degs tiliwa
Iwakken ad ccen seg izwayen iS, akked wayen d ssawven ifassen nnsen. Day ur snemmiren ara
Gedha s Win Ixelqen akw tiyugiwin, seg wayen d issenkar wakal, seg wayen d ssenkaren nitni, u seg wayen ur ssinen
Assekni i nitni: iv. Nekkes ass, segs, d$a atnan di tillas
Iiij ippazalen s amkan is; ayagi, d lqwedoa n Uzmir Amusnaw
Aggur, Neouem as udmawen, alamma iu$al am uaaooun aqdim
Ur ippunefk ara i iiij ad imager aggur, ne$ i iv, a d izwir ass. Akw, ppaumun deg iberdan nnsen
Assekni i nitni: Neddem tarwa nnsen di sfina iccuoen
Nxelq asen d, seg umedya s, ayen i$ef rekkben
Lemmer i £ ihwi, a ten Ne$meq, ur d psu$un, ur pwaselken
siwa aeunu nne£; ad zhun tallit kan
Mara ad asen inin: eezzbet i wayen illan zdat wen, akked wayen illan deffir wen, amar aeunu fellawen
Ur ten id ippas ussekni, seg issekniyen n Mass nnsen, mebla ma numren t
Ma pwanecden: "seddqet seg wayen is ikwen id I$at Oebbi", ad inin wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "day a neccecc win ara Iccecc Oebbi ma ihwa yaS? Kunwi di ttelfan kan n uuee
La qqaoen: "melmi p lemaahda yagi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ad ganin kan asu$u yiwen, ara ten ieazen, wayel ppemqellaaen
Ur zmiren ad weuuin, ne$ ad qqwlen ar twacult nnsen
Auuvu di lbuq: atnan la qefzen, si tneilin, ar Mass nnsen
Qqaoen: "a ssexv nne$! Anwa i $ d issekren, seg usu nne$, agi? D aya i d Iwaaaed Uenin, u nnan tidep imazanen
Asu$u yiwen kan: a d rsen akw, zdat nne£
Assa, ur ipwadennes ooue, s wacemma. A ppeppuqeiiim kan, $ef wayen txeddmem
Ih, at Loennet, assa, ad lhin di lfeoe
Nitni akked tlawin nnsen, di tili, elen deg imieoeen
I nitni, degs, izwayen. I nitni ayen ssutren
Talwit! Awal s$uo Mass Ipeunun. ¨¨
Oueet akin, assa, a yibe$wviyen
Day ur kwen Nuba$ ara, a tarwa n Adem, ur taabdem ara Cciian? Neppa, war ccekk, d acengu nnwen n uuee
Ad iyI taabdem, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Ni$ itlef ayen ur nferru, n imdanen segwen. Day tezgam ur tepmeyyizem ara
Tagi d Loahennama i wen ippuwaaaden
Eo$et degs, assa, ilmend n tijehli nnwen
Assa, a Neskweo imawen nnsen, a £ d hedoen ifassen nnsen, a d cehhden ivaoen nnsen, af wayen kesben
Lemmer i £ ihwi, ad asen nergel allen nnsen, ad mzizlen s abrid. Amek ara walin
Lemmer i £ ihwi, ad asen nbeddel udem deg imukan nnsen, ur zmiren ad qqedmen, ne$ ad wexxoen
Win iwumi Nessi$wzef laameo, Neppara yas lxelq amengal. Day ur pxemmimen ara
Ur as Nesseefev tamedyazt, ur as tlaq. Ayagi, siwa asmekti akked Leqwoan ipbegginen
Ad inabi win idren, ad iuao wawal af ijehliyen
Day ur walan ara ar Nexleq asen lmal, s ufus nne£, a ten saun
Nerra ten d ixdimen nnsen, kra rekben ten, kra teppen ten
I nitni, segsen, aba$uo, tissit. Day ur snemmiren ara
Ddmen ioebbiten, war Oebbi, iwakken amar ad pwassellken
Ur zmiren a ten ssellken; d nitni ay d iasekoiwen id ikren $uosen
Ur k $webbent tmenna nsen. Neeoa, s tidep, ayen teffren d wayen d qqaoen
Day ur ieoa ara umdan, ar Nxelq it id si tiqqit? Atan neppa d axuim n uuee
Ifka ya£ d amedya, ippu lxelq is, inna: "anwa ara d issidren i$san iu$alen d a$webbao
Ini: "a ten id Issider Win iten id Ixelqen, abrid amenzu. Neppa Ieoa yal lxelq
Win i wen Irran times di ttejoa tazegzawt; d$a, segs, kunwi tepcaalam
Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, day ur Izmir ara ad Ixleq i ten icban? Ih, u Neppa, d Axellaq, Amusnaw
Lameo iS kan, ma illa wayen Ib$a, ad as Yini: "ili"! Ad yili
Gedha s Win Isaan, deg ufus iS, tagelda n yal cci! £uoeS ara kwen rren
